original_text: Each of the cherubim had four faces: One face was that of a cherub, the second the face of a human being, the third the face of a lion, and the fourth the face of an eagle.
korean_text: 그룹들에게는 각기 네 면이 있는데 첫째 면은 그룹의 얼굴이요 둘째 면은 사람의 얼굴이요 셋째는 사자의 얼굴이요 넷째는 독수리의 얼굴이더라

sentences.original_text: Each of the cherubim had four faces
sentences.korean_translation: 각 그룹은 네 개의 얼굴을 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: One face was that of a cherub
the second the face of a human being
the third the face of a lion
and the fourth the face of an eagle
